Class Location

java.lang.Object
Location
Direct Known Subclasses:
LocationRestaurant, LocationWhitelisted
public class Location
extends java.lang.Object
Base location class, contains information about a single tile in the simulated world. Knows which persons are present, person class instance can visit or leave a location.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected Position position
    Position of the location in the whole simulated world
    protected java.util.List<Person> visitors
    List of persons currently present at the locations position

  • Method Details

    • visit

      public boolean visit​(Person person, ContagionParameters parameters)
      Accepts the person, adds it to the visitors list.
      Parameters:
      person - person to visit this location.
      parameters - currently active contagion parameters
      Returns:
      true if the person can visit this location, false if the person isn't allowed there.

    • leave

      public void leave​(Person person)
      Removes the person from visitors list.
      Parameters:
      person - person that is leaving this location.

    • getPosition

      public Position getPosition()
      Position getter.
      Returns:
      position of this location

    • getStats

      public Stats getStats()
      Calculates stats for this location only and returns it.
      Returns:
      Stats of this location. (Counts of different health states.)

    • calculateVisitorsHealth

      public void calculateVisitorsHealth​(ContagionParameters parameters)
      Runs simulation of decease spread and health status changes among it's visitors.
      Parameters:
      parameters - infection parameters - settings of contagion.

    • tryInfectVisitors

      protected void tryInfectVisitors​(ContagionParameters parameters, double spreadChance)
      For every infected person in the locations tries to infect all healthy people in the location.
      Parameters:
      parameters - Contagion parameters of the contagion.
      spreadChance - Chance with which one person infects another in this location.

    • getTypeSting

      public java.lang.String getTypeSting()
      Returns text with name of the locations type
      Returns:
      String - name of the locations type

    • parseLocation

      public static Location parseLocation​(java.lang.String locationString)
      Parses location from given formatted string
      Parameters:
      locationString - formatted string representing the location.
      Returns:
      Location parsed location of the correct type parsed from the string.
